channel.title: I need help with client editing and adding monsters
channel.description:
hello mopar, i need help with adding npc's i went it the npc.xml and edited where i wanted specific npcs and stuff and then i compressed it and compiled it and then restarted server and they werent there so i spawned them and then i killed the ones that were monsters to see if they came back but they didnt. please help me with this.
i also need help with making a bigger client. is there a guide for this or can someone help me ?

item.title: I need help with client editing and adding monsters
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:3, topic:308025”]you plan on helping him with the big client bu yet are questioning where to even start?.. very unproffesional

but yes you are correct the bigger client screen is in the midclient

cliet width
clientheight

@Pandemic

show me what you added…
and btw its npcLoc.xml[/quote]

i know pesterd, i knew how to make the client bigger, i knew for myself it was mudclient but i was just making sure, so if anyone posted they might say yes like u ^^

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with client editing and adding monsters
